docs.text: Hi there 👋 ¶ I am Developer at heart, working as Senior Solutions Architect, Amazon web services . Currently, working with different customers across Nordics, helping them to make best use of AWS services and accelerate their journey to cloud. In my spare time, I enjoy running into the woods and love to learn new technical skills. I am quite passionate about DevOps and serverless technologies in general. :: ::
